page.title: 14A school caretaker's work
page.content:
Mrs Bedford is the caretaker of Witherley Primary School. She comes to school each morning at 7 o'clock and opens up. She checks the school and does a little cleaning, and then goes home. She returns to school at quarter past 3, which is when the children finish their lessons. Her main job then is sweeping the floors, though she says that perhaps her most important job is cleaning the toilets. She finishes work at 6 o'clock.
In her work she uses dusters, brushes, a mop and bucket, and a lot of disinfectant.
She says that she likes her job.
